text: Skazhi, o prorok: "YA ne uveshchevayu vas svoimi slovami, a uveshchevayu vas Otkroveniyem ot Allakha, vernym i istinnym. Neveruyushchiye tak dolgo otvrashchalis' ot Istiny Allakha, chto On nalozhil pechat' na ikh slukh, i oni stali kak glukhiye. Ved' glukhiye ne slyshat, kogda ikh uveshchevayut o nakazanii
